available_tools.name: start_processing_job
available_tools.description: Starts an asynchronous data processing job

parameters.name: data_source
parameters.description: Source of the data to process

return.description: Details about the started job including job_id

available_tools.name: generate_report
available_tools.description: Generates a report from processed data

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: ID of the completed processing job

parameters.name: report_format
parameters.description: Format of the report (pdf, html, csv)

return.description: URL where the generated report can be accessed

available_tools.name: send_notification
available_tools.description: Sends a notification to the user

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user to notify

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message to send to the user
